review: We were 02 families and stayed here from 1-3 June in lake view rooms. Lake view rooms are nice & cozy with all necessary amenities with private balcony in front of Bhimtal Lake. Food is again very delicious be it vegetarian OR non-vegetarian. Staff is very polite & helpful all the times. Though their room service is bit slow and being a new hotel they are working on it. In my opinion, it is better to stay in Bhimtal as you will not find it too much crowded or overpriced item and better to do same day excursion to Nainital. This place is best for honeymoon couples and nature lovers. We really enjoyed
